dcterms:creator: Alexey Dosovitskiy
German Ros

dcterms:description: An open urban driving simulator that provides access to its Unreal engine via a Python API, allowing for the generation of images and game state representations.
dcterms:title: CARLA

dcterms:creator: Ting Chen
Simon Kornblith
Mohammad Norouzi
Geoffrey Hinton
dcterms:description: A simple framework for contrastive learning of visual representations that uses image augmentations to create positive and negative pairs for training.
dcterms:title: SimCLR

dcterms:creator: Chintan Trivedi
Konstantinos Makantasis
Antonios Liapis
Georgios N. Yannakakis
dcterms:description: Traffic variables derived from the CARLA simulator, used to describe the state of traffic around an ego-vehicle, including distances and directions to surrounding vehicles.
dcterms:title: Traffic Variables (derived from CARLA)
